java.lang.Object

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • updateHighScore

      public boolean updateHighScore(int currentScore)
      Updates the high score if the current score is higher. Called when the game ends.
      Parameters:
      currentScore - the current game score
      Returns:
      true if a new high score was set, false otherwise

    • initGameView

      public void initGameView(int[][] boardMatrix, ViewData brick)
      Initializes the game view by setting up the background grid, falling brick, and game loop.
      Parameters:
      boardMatrix - the game board matrix
      brick - the initial brick data

    • setBoard

      public void setBoard(Board board)
      Sets the board reference for accessing next bricks.
      Parameters:
      board - the game board

    • refreshBrick

      public void refreshBrick(ViewData brick)
      Refreshes the brick display based on the provided ViewData. This method is called by GameInputHandler and must be accessible.
      Parameters:
      brick - the ViewData containing brick position and shape information

    • refreshGameBackground

      public void refreshGameBackground(int[][] board)

    • moveDown

      public void moveDown(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the down movement event. This method is called by GameInputHandler and must be accessible.
      Parameters:
      event - the MoveEvent representing the down movement

    • hardDrop

      public void hardDrop(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the hard drop event from the input handler. This method is called when the user presses the spacebar to instantly drop the brick.
      Parameters:
      event - the MoveEvent representing the hard drop

    • setEventListener

      public void setEventListener(InputEventListener eventListener)

    • bindScore

      public void bindScore(javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty integerProperty)
      Binds the score property to the score label display. Updates the label text whenever the score changes.
      Parameters:
      integerProperty - the score property to bind to

    • bindLevel

      public void bindLevel(javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty levelProperty, GameMode gameMode)
      Binds the level property to the level label and sets up speed adjustment based on level. The game speed increases (drop interval decreases) as the level increases.
      Parameters:
      levelProperty - the IntegerProperty representing the current level
      gameMode - the current game mode (CLASSIC or OVERGROWTH)

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver()

    • showVictory

      public void showVictory()
      Shows the victory screen when the player wins (e.g., clears all gold in Treasure Hunt mode). Reuses the gameOverPanel but changes the title to "YOU WIN!" in gold color.

    • newGame

      public void newGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)

    • togglePause

      public void togglePause()
      Toggles the pause state of the game. Shows/hides the pause panel and stops/starts the game timeline.

    • setGameController

      public void setGameController(GameController controller)
      Sets the GameController reference for pause/resume functionality.
      Parameters:
      controller - the GameController instance

    • setPrimaryStage

      public void setPrimaryStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Sets the primary stage reference for navigation purposes.
      Parameters:
      stage - the primary stage

    • pauseGame

      public void pauseGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
